name: Exp_CNS_NoSpec
shortdesc: A simple, explicit, stencil-based test code for integrating the the compressible Navier-Stokes equations.
longdesc: A simple, explicit, stencil-based test code for integrating the the compressible Navier-Stokes equations. The code uses 8th order finite differences in space and a 3rd order, low-storage TVD RK algorithm in time.
